name: Regurgitate
description: Bakasura regurgitates all of the minions consumed by his Eat Minion ability at his ground target location that Slows and Cripples enemy players. Bakasura's Basic Attacks become cone attacks and he is immune to Crowd Control for a short duration. Bakasura is able to use Eat Minion on his regurgitated minions.
stats: Minion Damage: 17 (+15% of your physical damage)
